name: saman-seo
description: Asset build pipeline for the Saman SEO plugin

scripts.build:less: lessc --compress assets/less/admin.less build/css/admin.css && lessc --compress assets/less/editor.less build/css/editor.css && lessc --compress assets/less/internal-linking.less build/css/internal-linking.css && lessc --compress assets/less/plugin.less build/css/plugin.css && lessc --compress assets/less/breadcrumbs.less build/css/breadcrumbs.css
scripts.build:v2: npm run build:less-v2 && wp-scripts build src-v2/index.js --output-path=build/v2
scripts.build: npm run build:less && npm run build:v2 && npm run build:editor && npm run build:admin-list
scripts.watch:less: concurrently "less-watch-compiler assets/less build/css admin.less --minified" "less-watch-compiler assets/less build/css editor.less --minified" "less-watch-compiler assets/less build/css internal-linking.less --minified" "less-watch-compiler assets/less build/css plugin.less --minified" "less-watch-compiler assets/less build/css breadcrumbs.less --minified"
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch:less

author: Juan Denis
